title: *Goes into aram for short game*
body: **Takes as long as a normal game** Having a team of bronze and silver vsing plats.... Probs could've won if they knew how to play but not blaming them. I'm trash with kalista aha. Ever had an aram go for 37 mins?

replies.body: WHYYYYY. WHYYYY DO PEOPLE BUY BOOTS ON ARAM, AND THEN KEEP IT AS THEIR COMPLETE BUILD, ON ARAM, ON HOWLING ABYSS, IN 1 SINGLE LANE, WHERE EVERYONE FIGHTS OR NOBODY DOES, OMFG RAGE
Ever heard of dodging skill shots?

in this guys match, as a kalista, i would only ever follow up engage when i throw wu in and he ults (if he didnt bind to wu he deserves to lose, getting off a good gnar combo after an ult would be risky and might not work the 1st time when you realise.....how it works.....or something. oh right, and, when im not engaging id keep my distance like a good little carry, ive played enough league to know how to play around my enemy

Yeah you could be right though. I had runaans but eventually sold for Maw.. The whole team was a pussy and wukong was bronze 4 so I binded to gnar who was silver 3.. I think wuk lost his balls somewhere cause he was last to go in aha.. It was that bad that I had tanked ALMOST as much as the gnar.. about 3k behind... Most dmg taken most dmg done

http://i.imgur.com/NDdwLOS.png

That's my most recent one, i have had one that went 40-45 minutes though.
Jeez.. Pretty balanced team comp aha
